actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Provisions of Measure Incorporated Into H.R.4333.

official_title: A bill relating to the treatment of certain ground rents for purposes of the mortgage bond rules of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

summary.text: Fixes valuation standards for purposes of mortgage revenue bond purchase price requirements in connection with any ground lease having a remaining term of at least 35 years and a specified ground rent for at least the initial ten years of the term. Requires that pertinent Federal regulations be amended to reflect these standards.

titles.title: A bill relating to the treatment of certain ground rents for purposes of the mortgage bond rules of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
